duties_responsibilities.duty: Be the front-end support personnel for the Santa Fe Recovery Center, working with desktop issues, print issues, Office 365, Azure Active Directory, Zoom Cloud VOIP management, and basic network issues.
Experience with Office 365 and Azure Active Directory is required.
Serve as the primary point of contact for desktop support and Zoom Cloud support.
Manage software installation and rollout, and set up and diagnose phone issues/support.
Document asset inventory and establish partnerships and relationships with staff and board members.
Perform other duties as assigned by the Information Technology Operations Administrator.
